QuestData.Title: Echo Hunters
QuestData.Description: I am no sorcerer, but I've picked up a few spells in my time - enough for me to pass unseen by the naked eye.$B$BUnfortunately, the vampire bats in these woods don't use their eyes. They will hear my shuffling robes and Percy's incessant clucking a mile away.$B$BClear them away from the path, would you?
QuestData.RewardText: Blasted things. Nothing more than flying rats if you ask me!
